content.question: The railway network shown on the map most likely contributed to the large-scale migration of which of the following groups in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries?

choices.label: Spanish peninsulares fleeing back to Spain
European settlers choosing freely to emigrate from Europe
Argentinian indentured servants looking for work in East Asia

content.answer: European settlers choosing freely to emigrate from Europe

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
